At the end of the movie, when the credits of the film begin, there is no sound.

In VLC:
*Tools > Effects and Filters -- Enable; 2 Pass
*Tools > Track Synchronization > Advance of audio over video -- "-0.300s"

Mediocre subtitles available here: http://subscene.com/english/The-Social-Network/subtitle-386786.aspx

After that the only problem is the missing audio during the credits, but still very watchable. However, try the BDRip by iMBT or the x264 BDRip from MKVGuy for much less hassle in a smaller filesize :)
